gui

Class BallCourtControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.BallCourtControl

  • public class BallCourtControl
extends java.lang.Object
    Class implementing the control GUI of the BouncingBall game.
    Version:
    2020-01-25
    Author:
    Jan Peleska

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  BallCourtControl.BallCourtWindowAdapter
      Inner class for WindowAdapters of BallCourtFrames

    • Field Detail

      • bcframes

        private BallCourtFrame[] bcframes
        Array where ball court frames are registered. The index is also used as the number of the ball court frame. If no ball court frame is associated with an index i, bcframes[i] == null holds.

      • createBcButton

        private javax.swing.JButton createBcButton
        A button controlling the creation of a new BC frame

      • currentBc

        private BallCourtFrame currentBc
        Reference to the ball court frame which is currently active. If no ball court frame is active, currentBc == null holds.

      • currentBcNo

        private int currentBcNo
        Index of the ball court frame which is currently active. If no ball court frame is active, currentBcNo == -1 holds. Otherwise currentBcNo in 0..MAX_FRAMES-1

      • destroyBcButton

        private javax.swing.JButton destroyBcButton
        A button controlling the destruction of a BC frame

      • exitButton

        private javax.swing.JButton exitButton
        The EXIT button

      • filechooser

        private static final javax.swing.JFileChooser filechooser
        File chooser object

      • frame

        private javax.swing.JFrame frame
        Main user interface frame

      • loadFromFileButton

        private javax.swing.JButton loadFromFileButton
        A button element controlling the selection of ball court frame from serialization file

      • MAX_FRAMES

        private static final int MAX_FRAMES
        Maximal number of ball court frames that are simultaneously active
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • outputTextField

        private javax.swing.JLabel outputTextField
        Target file for the created files

      • outputTextLabel

        private javax.swing.JLabel outputTextLabel
        Label of the file selection text field

        javax.swing.JRadioButton radioButton0
        Radio button 0

        private javax.swing.JButton serializeBcButton
        A button controlling the serialization and destruction of a BC frame

    • Constructor Detail

      • BallCourtControl

        public BallCourtControl()

    • Method Detail

      • createBcFrame

        private void createBcFrame()
        Create a new BallCourtFrame instance with a player and a ball inside and initialise the frame as by calling initialiseCurrentFrame.

      • createFrame

        private void createFrame()
        Create the window frame with Grid Layout, 7 lines, and 2 columns

      • createMenuBar

        private void createMenuBar()
        Create the menu bar with the following menus
        • File menue with EXIT command
        • Help menue with About-command

      • createWidgets

        private void createWidgets()
        Create the following widgets and associate action listeners.
        • EXIT button - action listener calls method doExit
        • Load from File button - action listener calls method deserializeFrame
        • Create BC button - action listener calls method createBcFrame
        • Destroy BC - action listener calls method destroyBcFrame
        • Save&destroy BC - action listener calls method
        • 4 Radio buttons for BC frame selection in range 0..MAX_FRAMES-1
        • One text label indicating the selected BC (if any)

      • deserializeFrame

        private void deserializeFrame()
        Activate ball court frame for selected ball court number by means of de-serialisation from file. The following actions are performed.
        • Show open-file dialogue to user
        • If valid file is selected, de-serialize object from file and assign it to currentBc in the ball court which is currently selected
        • Set the GUI button state accordingly and make the frame visible by calling method initialiseCurrentFrame

      • destroyBcFrame

        private void destroyBcFrame()
        Make selected ball court frame invisible and release its window-related resources. Update bcframes, currentBc and button states accordingly.

      • doExit

        private void doExit()
        Closes the GUI -- Listener action for the EXIT button

      • initialiseCurrentFrame

        private void initialiseCurrentFrame()
        Initialise the current ball court frame after de-serialization by performing the following actions.
        • assign currentBc to the bcframes array at index currentBcNo
        • insert the frame number into the window title
        • Register a new BallCourtWindowAdapter-instance as window listener
        • Enable only the destroy buttons
        • Make the window frame and its content visible;

      • makeButtonsVisible

        private void makeButtonsVisible(boolean createButton,
                                boolean loadButton,
                                boolean destroyButton,
                                boolean serializeButton)
        Make command buttons visible or invisble
        Parameters:
        createButton - Makes the CREATE BC button visible iff true
        createButton - Makes the LOAD BC FROM FILE button visible iff true
        createButton - Makes the DESTROY BC button visible iff true
        createButton - Makes the SAVE&DESTROY BC button visible iff true

      • serializeAndDestroyBcFrame

        private void serializeAndDestroyBcFrame()
        Serialize and destroy an active ball court frame by performing the following actions.
        • Present save-to-file dialogue to user
        • Serialize currentBc to the selected file
        • Make the current ball court frame invisible and release its resources as specified for methdd destroyBcFrame.

      • setCurrentFrame

        private void setCurrentFrame(int frameNum)
        Set the selected BC frame according to given number
        Parameters:
        frameNum - Number in 0..MAX_FRAMES-1 for the frame to be selected. The method expects that an active frame is already registered in bcframes[frameNum] and sets currentBc, the BC text field, and the command button state accordingly.

      • setup

        public void setup()
        Setup the GUI by performing the following actions
        • Create the window frame
        • Create the menue bar
        • Create the widgets
        • Add widgets to frame
        • Make command buttons visible in de-activated state
        • pack the frame and make it visible

      • showAboutInformation

        private void showAboutInformation()
        Display dialog containing information about tool version and developer

      • update

        public void update()
        Update all existing ball court frames by calling their run-method

      • widgetsToFrame

        private void widgetsToFrame()
        Add widges created by method createWidgets to GUI frame
